turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a flat white from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: just the milk, the cons of it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size do you want it in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you want a grande flat white, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick up from the location on William F. McClellan Highway in Boston, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, I have ordered you a grande flat white to be picked up at the Starbucks on William F. McClellan Highway, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can I help you with anything else?
